extDescription.message: A Course in Miracles lessons notifier.

1.message: Nothing I see in this room [on this street, from this window, in this place] means anything.

2.message: I have given everything I see in this room [on this street, from this window, in this place] all the meaning that it has for me.

3.message: I do not understand anything I see in this room [on this street, from this window, in this place].

4.message: These thoughts do not mean anything. They are like the things I see in this room [on this street, from this window, in this place].

5.message: I am never upset for the reason I think.

6.message: I am upset because I see something that is not there.

8.message: My mind is preoccupied with past thoughts.

9.message: I see nothing as it is now.

10.message: My thoughts do not mean anything.

11.message: My meaningless thoughts are showing me a meaningless world.

12.message: I am upset because I see a meaningless world.

14.message: God did not create a meaningless world.

15.message: My thoughts are images that I have made.

18.message: I am not alone in experiencing the effects of my seeing.

19.message: I am not alone in experiencing the effects of my thoughts.

21.message: I am determined to see things differently.

22.message: What I see is a form of vengeance.

23.message: I can escape from the world I see by giving up attack thoughts.

24.message: I do not perceive my own best interests.

25.message: I do not know what anything is for.

26.message: My attack thoughts are attacking my invulnerability.

27.message: Above all else I want to see.

28.message: Above all else I want to see things differently.

29.message: God is in everything I see.

30.message: God is in everything I see because God is in my mind.

31.message: I am not the victim of the world I see.

32.message: I have invented the world I see.

33.message: There is another way of looking at the world.

34.message: I could see peace instead of this.

35.message: My mind is part of God’s. I am very holy.

36.message: My holiness envelops everything I see.

38.message: There is nothing my holiness cannot do.

40.message: I am blessed as a Son of God.

41.message: God goes with me wherever I go.

42.message: God is my strength. Vision is His gift.

43.message: God is my Source. I cannot see apart from Him.

44.message: God is the light in which I see.

45.message: God is the Mind with which I think.

46.message: God is the Love in which I forgive.

47.message: God is the strength in which I trust.

49.message: God’s Voice speaks to me all through the day.

50.message: I am sustained by the Love of God.

61.message: I am the light of the world.

62.message: Forgiveness is my function as the light of the world.

63.message: The light of the world brings peace to every mind through my forgiveness.

64.message: Let me not forget my function.

65.message: My only function is the one God gave me.

66.message: My happiness and my function are one.

69.message: My grievances hide the light of the world in me.

71.message: Only God’s plan for salvation will work.

72.message: Holding grievances is an attack on God’s plan for salvation.

74.message: There is no will but God’s.

76.message: I am under no laws but God’s.

79.message: Let me recognize the problem so it can be solved.

80.message: Let me recognize my problems have been solved.

92.message: Miracles are seen in light, and light and strength are one.

93.message: Light and joy and peace abide in me.

94.message: I am as God created me.

95.message: I am one Self, united with my Creator.

96.message: Salvation comes from my one Self.

98.message: I will accept my part in God’s plan for salvation.

99.message: Salvation is my only function here.

100.message: My part is essential to God’s plan for salvation.

101.message: God’s Will for me is perfect happiness.

102.message: I share God’s Will for happiness for me.

103.message: God, being Love, is also happiness.

104.message: I seek but what belongs to me in truth.

105.message: God’s peace and joy are mine.

106.message: Let me be still and listen to the truth.

107.message: Truth will correct all errors in my mind.

108.message: To give and to receive are one in truth.

110.message: I am as God created me.

121.message: Forgiveness is the key to happiness.

123.message: I thank my Father for His gifts to me.

124.message: Let me remember I am one with God.

125.message: In quiet I receive God’s Word today.

126.message: All that I give is given to myself.

127.message: There is no love but God’s.

128.message: The world I see holds nothing that I want.

129.message: Beyond this world there is a world I want.

130.message: It is impossible to see two worlds.

131.message: No one can fail who seeks to reach the truth.

132.message: I loose the world from all I thought it was.

133.message: I will not value what is valueless.

134.message: Let me perceive forgiveness as it is.

135.message: If I defend myself I am attacked.

136.message: Sickness is a defense against the truth.

137.message: When I am healed I am not healed alone.

138.message: Heaven is the decision I must make.

139.message: I will accept Atonement for myself.

140.message: Only salvation can be said to cure.

151.message: All things are echoes of the Voice for God.

152.message: The power of decision is my own.

153.message: In my defenselessness my safety lies.

154.message: I am among the ministers of God.

155.message: I will step back and let Him lead the way.

156.message: I walk with God in perfect holiness.

157.message: Into His Presence would I enter now.

158.message: Today I learn to give as I receive.

159.message: I give the miracles I have received.

160.message: I am at home. Fear is the stranger here.

161.message: Give me your blessing, holy Son of God.

162.message: I am as God created me.

163.message: There is no death. The Son of God is free.

164.message: Now are we one with Him Who is our Source.

165.message: Let not my mind deny the Thought of God.

166.message: I am entrusted with the gifts of God.

167.message: There is one life, and that I share with God.

168.message: Your grace is given me. I claim it now.

169.message: By grace I live. By grace I am released.

170.message: There is no cruelty in God and none in me.

181.message: I trust my brothers, who are one with me.

182.message: I will be still an instant and go home.

183.message: I call upon God’s Name and on my own.

184.message: The Name of God is my inheritance.

185.message: I want the peace of God.

186.message: Salvation of the world depends on me.

187.message: I bless the world because I bless myself.

188.message: The peace of God is shining in me now.

189.message: I feel the Love of God within me now.

190.message: I choose the joy of God instead of pain.

191.message: I am the holy Son of God Himself.

192.message: I have a function God would have me fill.

193.message: All things are lessons God would have me learn.

194.message: I place the future in the Hands of God.

195.message: Love is the way I walk in gratitude.

196.message: It can be but myself I crucify.

197.message: It can be but my gratitude I earn.

199.message: I am not a body. I am free.

200.message: There is no peace except the peace of God.

221.message: Peace to my mind. Let all my thoughts be still.

222.message: God is with me. I live and move in Him.

223.message: God is my life. I have no life but His.

224.message: God is my Father, and He loves His Son.

225.message: God is my Father, and His Son loves Him.

226.message: My home awaits me. I will hasten there.

227.message: This is my holy instant of release.

228.message: God has condemned me not. No more do I.

229.message: Love, which created me, is what I am.

230.message: Now will I seek and find the peace of God.

231.message: Father, I will but to remember You.

232.message: Be in my mind, my Father, through the day.

233.message: I give my life to God to guide today.

234.message: Father, today I am Your Son again.

235.message: God in His mercy wills that I be saved.

236.message: I rule my mind, which I alone must rule.

237.message: Now would I be as God created me.

238.message: On my decision all salvation rests.

239.message: The glory of my Father is my own.

240.message: Fear is not justified in any form.

241.message: This holy instant is salvation come.

242.message: This day is God’s. It is my gift to Him.

243.message: Today I will judge nothing that occurs.

244.message: I am in danger nowhere in the world.

245.message: Your peace is with me, Father. I am safe.

246.message: To love my Father is to love His Son.

247.message: Without forgiveness I will still be blind.

248.message: Whatever suffers is not part of me.

249.message: Forgiveness ends all suffering and loss.

250.message: Let me not see myself as limited.

251.message: I am in need of nothing but the truth.

252.message: The Son of God is my Identity.

253.message: My Self is ruler of the universe.

254.message: Let every voice but God’s be still in me.

255.message: This day I choose to spend in perfect peace.

256.message: God is the only goal I have today.

257.message: Let me remember what my purpose is.

258.message: Let me remember that my goal is God.

259.message: Let me remember that there is no sin.

260.message: Let me remember God created me.

261.message: God is my refuge and security.

262.message: Let me perceive no differences today.

263.message: My holy vision sees all things as pure.

264.message: I am surrounded by the Love of God.

265.message: Creation’s gentleness is all I see.

266.message: My holy Self abides in you, God’s Son.

267.message: My heart is beating in the peace of God.

268.message: Let all things be exactly as they are.

269.message: My sight goes forth to look upon Christ’s face.

270.message: I will not use the body’s eyes today.

271.message: Christ’s is the vision I will use today.

272.message: How can illusions satisfy God’s Son?

273.message: The stillness of the peace of God is mine.

274.message: Today belongs to love. Let me not fear.

275.message: God’s healing Voice protects all things today.

276.message: The Word of God is given me to speak.

277.message: Let me not bind Your Son with laws I made.

278.message: If I am bound, my Father is not free.

280.message: What limits can I lay upon God’s Son?

281.message: I can be hurt by nothing but my thoughts.

282.message: I will not be afraid of love today.

283.message: My true Identity abides in You.

284.message: I can elect to change all thoughts that hurt.

285.message: My holiness shines bright and clear today.

286.message: The hush of Heaven holds my heart today.

287.message: You are my goal, my Father. Only You.

288.message: Let me forget my brother’s past today.

289.message: The past is over. It can touch me not.

290.message: My present happiness is all I see.

291.message: This is a day of stillness and of peace.

292.message: A happy outcome to all things is sure.

293.message: All fear is past and only love is here.

294.message: My body is a wholly neutral thing.

295.message: The Holy Spirit looks through me today.

296.message: The Holy Spirit speaks through me today.

297.message: Forgiveness is the only gift I give.

298.message: I love You, Father, and I love Your Son.

300.message: Only an instant does this world endure.

301.message: And God Himself shall wipe away all tears.

302.message: Where darkness was I look upon the light.

303.message: The holy Christ is born in me today.

304.message: Let not my world obscure the sight of Christ.

305.message: There is a peace that Christ bestows on us.

306.message: The gift of Christ is all I seek today.

307.message: Conflicting wishes cannot be my will.

308.message: This instant is the only time there is.

309.message: I will not fear to look within today.

310.message: In fearlessness and love I spend today.

311.message: I judge all things as I would have them be.

312.message: I see all things as I would have them be.

313.message: Now let a new perception come to me.

314.message: I seek a future different from the past.

315.message: All gifts my brothers give belong to me.

316.message: All gifts I give my brothers are my own.

317.message: I follow in the way appointed me.

318.message: In me salvation’s means and end are one.

319.message: I came for the salvation of the world.

320.message: My Father gives all power unto me.

321.message: Father, my freedom is in You alone.

322.message: I can give up but what was never real.

323.message: I gladly make the “sacrifice” of fear.

324.message: I merely follow, for I would not lead.

325.message: All things I think I see reflect ideas.

326.message: I am forever an Effect of God.

327.message: I need but call and You will answer me.

328.message: I choose the second place to gain the first.

329.message: I have already chosen what You will.

330.message: I will not hurt myself again today.

331.message: There is no conflict, for my will is Yours.

332.message: Fear binds the world. Forgiveness sets it free.

333.message: Forgiveness ends the dream of conflict here.

334.message: Today I claim the gifts forgiveness gives.

335.message: I choose to see my brother’s sinlessness.

336.message: Forgiveness lets me know that minds are joined.

337.message: My sinlessness protects me from all harm.

338.message: I am affected only by my thoughts.

339.message: I will receive whatever I request.

340.message: I can be free of suffering today.

341.message: I can attack but my own sinlessness, And it is only that which keeps me safe.

342.message: I let forgiveness rest upon all things, For thus forgiveness will be given me.

343.message: I am not asked to make a sacrifice To find the mercy and the peace of God.

344.message: Today I learn the law of love; that what I give my brother is my gift to me.

345.message: I offer only miracles today, For I would have them be returned to me.

346.message: Today the peace of God envelops me, And I forget all things except His Love.

347.message: Anger must come from judgment. Judgment is The weapon I would use against myself, To keep the miracle away from me.

348.message: I have no cause for anger or for fear, For You surround me. And in every need That I perceive, Your grace suffices me.

349.message: Today I let Christ’s vision look upon All things for me and judge them not, but give Each one a miracle of love instead.

350.message: Miracles mirror God’s eternal Love. To offer them is to remember Him, And through His memory to save the world.

351.message: My sinless brother is my guide to peace. My sinful brother is my guide to pain. And which I choose to see I will behold.

352.message: Judgment and love are opposites. From one Come all the sorrows of the world. But from The other comes the peace of God Himself.

353.message: My eyes, my tongue, my hands, my feet today Have but one purpose; to be given Christ To use to bless the world with miracles.

354.message: We stand together, Christ and I, in peace And certainty of purpose. And in Him Is His Creator, as He is in me.

355.message: There is no end to all the peace and joy, And all the miracles that I will give, When I accept God’s Word. Why not today?

356.message: Sickness is but another name for sin. Healing is but another name for God. The miracle is thus a call to Him.

357.message: Truth answers every call we make to God, Responding first with miracles, and then Returning unto us to be itself.

358.message: No call to God can be unheard nor left Unanswered. And of this I can be sure; His answer is the one I really want.

359.message: God’s answer is some form of peace. All pain Is healed; all misery replaced with joy. All prison doors are opened. And all sin Is understood as merely a mistake.

360.message: Peace be to me, the holy Son of God. Peace to my brother, who is one with me. Let all the world be blessed with peace through us.

361.message: This holy instant would I give to You. Be You in charge. For I would follow You, Certain that Your direction gives me peace.

362.message: This holy instant would I give to You. Be You in charge. For I would follow You, Certain that Your direction gives me peace.

363.message: This holy instant would I give to You. Be You in charge. For I would follow You, Certain that Your direction gives me peace.

364.message: This holy instant would I give to You. Be You in charge. For I would follow You, Certain that Your direction gives me peace.

365.message: This holy instant would I give to You. Be You in charge. For I would follow You, Certain that Your direction gives me peace.
